bibl.title: The Form and Function of the Body of the Greek Letter: A Study of the Letter-Body in the Non-literary Papyri and in Paul the Apostle. (Society of Biblical Literature. Dissertation Series. 2.)
bibl.note: Diss. Vanderbilt Univ., 1970. - Introduction. - I. Transitional formulae in non-literary papyri letters. - II. Body of the Pauline letter: Phraseology and structure. - III. Comparison of the body of the letter in Paul and the papyri. - Bibliography.

bibl.author: Gerard Mussies
bibl.title: ThLZ 99
